hero.title: We increase the power of industries with our innovative hot forging solutions
hero.description: At Brkkol Alüminyum Metal Endüstri Tic Ltd, we specialize in the production of high-strength hot forged bolts designed to meet the most demanding industrial requirements. With decades of experience in metal forming and precision forging, we manufacture fastening solutions that deliver unmatched performance, durability, and reliability.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide everything we do and define who we are as a company.

items.title: Quality Excellence
items.description: We maintain the highest standards in every product we manufacture, ensuring superior performance and reliability.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Cutting-edge technology and continuous improvement drive our manufacturing processes and product development.

items.title: Customer Focus
items.description: Our client's success is our priority. We provide tailored solutions to meet specific industrial requirements.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: We are committed to environmentally responsible manufacturing practices and sustainable business operations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To be the leading provider of premium hot forged fastening solutions, empowering industries worldwide with products that exceed expectations in quality, performance, and reliability. We are committed to innovation, sustainability, and building lasting partnerships with our clients.

company.title: Company
company.description:
Brkkol Alüminyum Metal Endüstri Tic Ltd.
Specialized in high-strength hot forged bolts and precision fastening solutions for demanding industrial applications.

hero.title: High-Quality Fasteners
hero.description: Precision-engineered fastening solutions designed for critical applications. Our fasteners meet international standards and deliver exceptional performance in demanding environments.

features.title: Why Choose Our Fasteners?
features.description: Our fasteners are engineered for reliability, durability, and performance

bolts.title: Bolts
bolts.description: Advanced coating technologies for long-lasting protection

nuts.title: Nuts
nuts.description: Manufactured to exact specifications with tight tolerances

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Contact our technical team to discuss your fastener requirements and get a custom quote

hero.subtitle: Hot Forging
hero.title: Hot Forging Excellence
hero.description: Hot forging is a metal forming process conducted at elevated temperatures, typically ranging from 700°C to 1200°C, where the material is plastically deformed using mechanical or hydraulic presses. The high-temperature environment reduces homogeneity. Topçesan supports this process with a comprehensive portfolio of forging equipment and advanced engineering expertise.

company.title: About BRK Forging
company.description: At Brk Forging, we specialize in the production of forged components in a wide range of geometries and sizes, from 0.10 kg to 100 kg. Utilizing 13 active production lines and a comprehensive set of auxiliary machinery, we manufacture each part with a commitment to the highest standards of quality and operational efficiency.

processes.title: Our Forging Process
processes.description: Advanced hot forging techniques for superior component performance

controlledHeating.title: Controlled Heating
controlledHeating.description: Precise temperature control for optimal material properties

closedDieForging.title: Closed Die Forging
closedDieForging.description: Advanced die technology for complex geometries

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: Rigorous testing and inspection at every stage

materialTypes.label: Material Types
materialTypes.value: Carbon Steel, Alloy Steel, Stainless Steel

cta.title: Experience Hot Forging Excellence
cta.description: Partner with us for superior hot forged components that meet your exact specifications

hero.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing
hero.title: Precision Machining Services
hero.description: To meet precise dimensional and functional requirements, we offer comprehensive machining services following the hot forging process. Our in-house machining capabilities include CNC turning, milling, drilling, and threading operations, ensuring complete control over final turned part accuracy and surface finish.

services.title: Our Machining Services
services.description: Comprehensive machining solutions to transform your hot forged components into precision-engineered parts that meet the most demanding specifications.

cncTurning.title: CNC Turning
cncTurning.description: Precision turning operations for cylindrical components with tight tolerances and superior surface finish.

cncMilling.title: CNC Milling
cncMilling.description: Complex milling operations for creating precise geometries and features on various workpiece materials.

drillingThreading.title: Drilling & Threading
drillingThreading.description: Accurate hole drilling and thread cutting operations to meet exact specifications and standards.

surfaceFinishing.title: Surface Finishing
surfaceFinishing.description: Professional surface finishing techniques to achieve required surface roughness and appearance.

capabilities.title: Technical Capabilities
capabilities.description: Our state-of-the-art machining equipment and skilled technicians ensure that every component meets the highest standards of precision and quality.
capabilities.surfaceFinish: Surface finish: Ra 0.8 μm or better

integration.title: Complete Integration
integration.description: Seamless transition from hot forging to precision machining

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Rigorous quality control at every stage of production

fastTurnaround.title: Fast Turnaround
fastTurnaround.description: Efficient production processes for quick delivery

gallery.title: Machining Gallery
gallery.description: See our precision machining capabilities in action

cta.title: Precision You Can Trust
cta.description: Experience the difference that precision machining makes for your critical components. Get a quote today!

brand.description: Leading manufacturer of high-quality hot forged bolts, fasteners, and precision machined components for industrial applications worldwide.

overview.title: DIN 912 SOCKET HEAD CAP SCREW
overview.description: DIN 912/ISO 4762/UNI5931 socket head cap screws have high tensile strength and also have good wear and corrosion resistance characteristics. These attributes make them suitable for use in extreme areas and demanding applications. Additionally, the screws are available in different sizes and from different materials to meet customer needs.

coatings.title: Available Coatings
coatings.description: Whether you need Zinc plating, PTFE coatings, or any other surface treatment, we've got you covered. Such as: Zinc plating, Zinc-Nickel plating, Zinc-Flake coatings like Geomet, Dörken, Magni, Corundum, PTFE coatings like Xylan, Xylar, Lubo lubrication, Hot dip galvanising, HDG, Sherardising, Passivating, Antifricor, Powdercoating, Mechanical Zinc, Zinc-Iron... etc.

overview.title: DIN 7991 COUNTERSUNK HEAD SCREWS
overview.description: ISO-10642-DIN-7991-UNI5933 Hexalobular Socket Countersunk Head Bolt Used when a flush surface is needed after installation. These attributes make them suitable for use in areas that are common in machinery, automotive, furniture, electronics, and structural assemblies

StudDIN529.title: STUD DIN 529 ANCHOR BOLT
StudDIN529.description: DIN 529 is a German standard that defines various types of anchor bolts (also called foundation bolts), which are used to embed in concrete for securing structural components such as columns, steel frames, and machinery.

productOverview.title: DIN 939 DOUBLE-END STUD BOLT
productOverview.description: DIN 939 is a double-end stud bolts with equal thread lengths on both ends and an unthreaded center portion (shank). They are commonly used in applications where high strength and secure fastening are required, such as in flanged connections, machinery assembly, and structural applications.

availableCoatings.description: Whether you need Zinc plating, PTFE coatings, or any other surface treatment, we've got you covered. header.title: J TYPE ANCHOR BOLT
header.description: A J anchor bolt is a type of fastener shaped like the letter "J", commonly used in construction and structural applications

header.title: L BOLT ANCHOR
header.description: An L-bolt is a type of anchor bolt that is bent in the shape of the letter "L". It is used to secure structural elements to concrete.
